from .imports import *
from .torch_imports import *
[docs]def sum_geom(a,r,n): return a*n if r==1 else math.ceil(a*(1-r**n)/(1-r)) conv_dict = {np.dtype('int8'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('int16'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('int32'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('int64'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('float32'): torch.FloatTensor, np.dtype('float64'): torch.FloatTensor}
[docs]def T(a): if torch.is_tensor(a): res = a else: a = np.array(np.ascontiguousarray(a)) if a.dtype in (np.int8, np.int16, np.int32, np.int64): res = torch.LongTensor(a.astype(np.int64)) elif a.dtype in (np.float32, np.float64): res = torch.FloatTensor(a.astype(np.float32)) else: raise NotImplementedError(a.dtype)
return to_gpu(res, async=True)
[docs]def create_variable(x, volatile, requires_grad=False): if not isinstance(x, Variable): x = Variable(T(x), volatile=volatile, requires_grad=requires_grad)
return x
[docs]def V_(x, requires_grad=False):
return create_variable(x, False, requires_grad=requires_grad)
[docs]def V(x, requires_grad=False):
return [V_(o, requires_grad) for o in x] if isinstance(x,list) else V_(x, requires_grad)
[docs]def VV_(x): return create_variable(x, True)
[docs]def VV(x): return [VV_(o) for o in x] if isinstance(x,list) else VV_(x)
[docs]def to_np(v): if isinstance(v, (list,tuple)): return [to_np(o) for o in v] if isinstance(v, Variable): v=v.data
return v.cpu().numpy() USE_GPU=True
[docs]def to_gpu(x, *args, **kwargs):
return x.cuda(*args, **kwargs) if torch.cuda.is_available() and USE_GPU else x
[docs]def noop(*args, **kwargs): return
[docs]def split_by_idxs(seq, idxs): last = 0 for idx in idxs: yield seq[last:idx] last = idx
yield seq[last:]
[docs]def trainable_params_(m):
return [p for p in m.parameters() if p.requires_grad]
[docs]def chain_params(p): if isinstance(p, (list,tuple)): return list(chain(*[trainable_params_(o) for o in p]))
return trainable_params_(p)
[docs]def set_trainable_attr(m,b): m.trainable=b
for p in m.parameters(): p.requires_grad=b
[docs]def apply_leaf(m, f): c = children(m) if isinstance(m, nn.Module): f(m) if len(c)>0:
for l in c: apply_leaf(l,f)
[docs]def set_trainable(l, b):
apply_leaf(l, lambda m: set_trainable_attr(m,b))
[docs]def SGD_Momentum(momentum):
return lambda *args, **kwargs: optim.SGD(*args, momentum=momentum, **kwargs)
[docs]def one_hot(a,c): return np.eye(c)[a]
[docs]def partition(a, sz): return [a[i:i+sz] for i in range(0, len(a), sz)]
[docs]def partition_by_cores(a):
return partition(a, len(a)//num_cpus() + 1)
[docs]def num_cpus(): try: return len(os.sched_getaffinity(0)) except AttributeError:
return os.cpu_count()
[docs]class BasicModel(): def __init__(self,model,name='unnamed'): self.model,self.name = model,name
[docs] def get_layer_groups(self, do_fc=False): return children(self.model)
[docs]class SingleModel(BasicModel):
[docs] def get_layer_groups(self): return [self.model]
[docs]class SimpleNet(nn.Module): def __init__(self, layers): super().__init__() self.layers = nn.ModuleList([ nn.Linear(layers[i], layers[i + 1]) for i in range(len(layers) - 1)])
[docs] def forward(self, x): x = x.view(x.size(0), -1) for l in self.layers: l_x = l(x) x = F.relu(l_x)
return F.log_softmax(l_x, dim=-1)
[docs]def save(fn, a): pickle.dump(a, open(fn,'wb'))
[docs]def load(fn): return pickle.load(open(fn,'rb'))
[docs]def load2(fn): return pickle.load(open(fn,'rb'), encoding='iso-8859-1')
[docs]def load_array(fname): return bcolz.open(fname)[:]
